mapper.select: SELECT t.ID id, t.PARAM_NAME paramName, t.PARAM_TYPE paramType, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_sys_parameter t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND t.PARAM_TYPE=#{paramType}

SELECT t.ID id, t.LISTENER_NAME listenerName, t.LISTENER_NUMB listenerNumb, t.SCHOOL_NAME schoolName, t.PERMISSION_FLAG permissionFlag, t.OPEN_ID openId, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_person_listener t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND t.OPEN_ID=#{openid}
